file_content.text:
Alert! A proclamation from House Thul: House Rist is home to many of the galaxy's greatest assassins. Their most lethal weapon is a poison: the "Tears of the Rist." Invisible, absorbed through the skin and utterly fatal. Many Thul soldiers have fallen to this diabolical concoction.
The "Tears of the Rist" must be analyzed if it is be beaten. Hardy, well-armed mercenaries are asked to recover samples of this poison from known Rist caches. Proceed with extreme caution: Rist operatives have been spotted in the area.
If successful, deliver the samples to the nearest outpost. If exposed to the poison, House Thul will cherish your memory.
